title: Chicago Little League Team Stripped Of U.S. Championship
teaser: Chicago's Jackie Robinson West Little League team — that was lauded for their play and sportsmanship, even honored at the White House — has been stripped of their U.S. championship title. On Wednesday, league officials said adult mangers of the team cheated by skirting fair play rules that require all players to live inside the same geographical boundaries.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
